mi wo hasu ni shi te sono shita wo kugurinukeru tsubame no sugata ga , hirari to , kagami no uchi ni ochi te iku .
mukou no uchi de ha rokujuu bakari no jii san ga , nokishita ni uzukumari nagara , damatsu te kai wo mui te iru . kachari to , kogatana ga ataru tabi ni , akai mi ga zaru no naka ni kakureru .
kara ha kirari to hikari wo houtsutsu te , ni shaku amari no kagerou wo mukou he yokogiru .
oka no gotoku ni uzutakaku , tsumiage rare ta , kaigara ha kaki ka , baka ka , mate gai ka .

houmura reru ato kara , sugu atarashii kai ga , yanagi no shita he tamaru .
jii san ha kai no yukue wo kouuru hima sae naku , tada muna shiki kara wo kagerou no ue he houridasu .
kare no zaru ni ha sasau beki soko naku shi te , karere no haru no nichi ha mujin kura ni nodoka to mieru .
sunagawa ha ni kan ni tara nu kobashi no shita wo nagare te ,
hama no hou he haru no mizu wo sosogu . haru no mizu ga haru no umi to deau atari ni ha , shinshi to shi te iku hiro no kan ami ga ,
ami no me wo nuke te mura he fuku nanpuu ni , namagusa ki nukumori wo atae tsutsu aru ka to ayashima reru .
sono kan kara , don tou wo tokashi te ,
kinaga ni notakura se ta you ni mieru no ga umi no shoku da .
kono keshiki to kono oyakata to ha toutei chouwa shi nai .

moshi kono oyakata no jinkaku ga kyouretsu deshi hen no fuukou to kikkou suru hodo no eikyou wo yo no zunou ni atae ta nara ba , yo ha ryousha no kan ni tatsu te sukoburu e n ze i hou saku no kan ni uta re ta darou .
saiwai ni shi te oyakata ha sahodo idai na gouketsu de ha nakatsu ta .
ikura edo tsuko de mo , dore hodo tanka wo kitsu te mo , kono konze n to shi te ta itou taru tenchi no dai kishou ni ha kanawa nai .
manpuku no nyou ze tsu wo rou shi te , akumade kono choushi wo yaburou to suru oyakata ha ,
hayaku ichi mijin to natsu te , ii taru shu n kou no uchi ni fuyuu shi te iru .
mujun to ha , chikara ni oi te , ryou ni oi te , moshikuha iki tai ku ni oi te hyoutan a i i ruru atawa zu shi te ,
shikamo dou teido ni kurai suru mono moshikuha nin no kan ni atsu te
hajime te , midashi e beki genshou de aru .
ryousha no kankaku ga hanahadashiku kenzetsu suru toki ha ,
kono mujun ha youyaku shi ji n rou ma shi te ,
kaette dai seiryoku no ichibu to natsu te katsudou suru ni itaru ka mo shire nu .
tai jin no shu so ku to natsu te saiko ga katsudou shi ,
saiko no kokou to natsu te ma isha ga katsudou shi , mai mono no shin pu ku to natsu te gyuuba ga katsudou shi eru no ha
kore ga tame de aru . ima waga oyakata ha
kagirinaki haru no keshiki wo haikei to shi te , isshu no kokkei wo enji te iru .
nodoka na haru no kanji wo kowasu beki hazu no kare ha ,
kaette nodoka na haru no kanji wo kokui ni soe tsutsu aru .
yo ha omowa zu yayoi nakaba ni nonki na yaji to chikazuki ni natsu ta you na kimochi ni natsu ta .
kono kiwamete anka naru ki enka ha , taihei no shou wo gushi taru haru no nichi ni mottomo chouwa se ru ichi saishoku de aru .

) aoi atama ha sudeni noren wo kugutsu te , shun puu ni fuka re te iru . shou owari kono rokuon ha paburikku
fusuma mo akehanatsu . yado no nin ha ooku mo ara nu ue ni ,
ie ha wariai ni hiroi . yo ga sumu heya ha , ooku mo ara nu nin no ,
nin rashiku furumau kyou wo , iku magari no rouka ni hedate tare ba ,
mono no oto sae shisaku no wazurai ni ha nara nu . kyou ha hitoshio shizuka de aru .
shujin mo , musume mo , gejo mo genan mo , shira nu ma ni ,
ware wo nokoshi te , tachinoi ta ka to omowa reru .
tachishirizoi ta to sure ba tada no tokoro he tachishirizoki ha se nu .
kasumi no kuni ka , kumo no kuni ka de arou .
aruiha kumo to mizu ga shizen ni chikazui te , kaji wo toru sae mo nouki umi no ue wo ,
itsu nagare ta to mo kokorozuka nu kan ni , shiroi ho ga
kumo tomo mizu tomo miwake gataki sakai ni tadayoi rai te , hate ha ho mizukara ga ,
izuko ni onore wo kumo to mizu yori sabetsu su beki ka wo
kurushimu atari he     sonna haruka na tokoro he tachishirizoi ta to omowa reru .
sore de nakere ba sotsuzen to haru no naka ni kieuse te , kore made no shidai ga ,
imagoro ha me ni mie nu rei fun to natsu te ,
hiroi tenchi no kan ni , kenbi kyou no chikara wo karu tomo ,
sa no nagori wo todome nu you ni natsu ta no de arou .
aruiha hibari ni kashi te , nanohana no ki wo naki tsukushi taru nochi ,
yuugure fukaki murasaki no tanabiku hotori he
itsu ta ka mo shire nu . mata ha nagaki nichi wo ,
katsu nagaku suru abu no tsutome wo hatashi taru nochi ,
zu i ni koru kan ki tsuyu wo sui sokone te ,
ochi tsubaki no shita ni , fusera re nagara , yo wo kanbashiku nemutsu te iru ka mo shire nu .
tonikaku shizuka na mono da . muna shiki ie wo ,
munashiku nukeru haru kaze no , nuke te iku ha
mukaeru nin he no giri de mo nai . kobamu mono he no tsura ate de mo nai .
onozukara kitari te , jikara saru , kouhei naru uchuu no kokoro de aru .
tanagokoro ni ago wo sasae taru yo no kokoro mo , waga sumu heya no gotoku munashikere ba ,
harukaze ha maneka nu ni , enryo mo naku iki nukeru de arou .
fumu ha chi to omoe ba koso , sake ha se nu ka to noki zukai mo okoru .
itadaku ha ten to shiru yue ni , inazuma no komekami ni furuu osore mo dekiru .
nin to arasowa ne ba ichibu n ga tata nu to ukiyo ga saisoku suru kara ,
kataku noku ha menkare nu . touzai no aru ken kon ni sun de ,
rigai no tsuna wo watara ne ba nara nu mi ni ha , jijitsu no koi ha ada de aru .
me ni miru tomi ha tsuchi de aru . nigiru mei to ubaeru homare to ha ,
kozakashi ki hachi ga amaku kamosu to mise te ,
hari wo su te saru mitsu no gotoki mono de arou .
iwayuru tanoshimi ha mono ni chaku suru yori okoru ga yue ni ,
arayuru kurushimi wo fukumu . tada shijin to
ga kaku naru mono atsu te , akumade kono tai tai sekai no seika wo kan de ,
te tsu kotsu tetsu zu i no kiyoshi ki wo shiru .
kasumi wo sa n shi , tsuyu wo nomi , shi wo hinshi , kou wo hyou shi te ,
shi ni itatsu te kui nu . kare ra no raku ha mono ni chaku suru no de ha nai . douka shi te
sono mono ni naru no de aru . sono mono ni nari sumashi ta toki ni ,
ware wo juritsu su beki yochi ha boubou taru daichi wo kiwamete mo miidashi e nu . jizai ni
de i dan wo hou ge shi te , hari tsuri ni mugen no sei ran wo moru .
itazura ni kono kyouguu wo nenshutsu suru no ha ,
aete shisei no dou shuuji no ki kaku shi te , konon de takaku hyou chi suru ga tame de ha nai . tada
shari no fukui n wo nobe te , heri aru shu jou wo sashimaneku nomi de aru . aritei ni ie ba shikyou to ii ,
ga kai to iu mo mina ni n ni n gu so ku no michi de aru . shun juu ni yubi wo ori tsukushi te ,
haku to u nishin gin suru no to to ie do mo , isshou wo kaiko shi te ,
etsureki no hadou wo junji ni tenken shi kuru toki ,
katsute ha bikou no shuu gai ni more te , ware wo wasure shi , ha
kushu no kyou wo yobiokosu koto ga dekiyou . deki nu to unwa ba ikigai no nai otoko de aru .
saredo ichi ji ni sokushi , ichi butsu ni ka suru nomi ga
shijin no kankyou to ha unwa nu . aru toki ha ichi ben no hana ni kashi , aru toki ha issou no chou ni kashi ,
aru ha uoozuuoosu no gotoku , ichidan no suisen ni kashi te ,
kokoro wo taku fuu no uchi ni ryouran se shimuru koto mo arou ga , nan to mo shire nu shi hen no fuukou ni
waga kokoro wo ubawa re te , waga kokoro wo ubaeru ha nanimono zo to mo meiryou ni ishiki se nu baai ga aru .
aru nin ha tenchi no kouki ni shoku ruru to iu darou .
aru nin ha mugen no kin wo rei dai ni kiku to iu darou .
mata aru nin ha shiri gataku , kaishi gataki yue ni
mugen no iki ni senkai shi te , hyoubyou no chimata ni houkou suru to keiyou suru ka mo shire nu .
nani to iu mo mina sono nin no jiyuu de aru . waga , kara ki no tsukue ni yori te
pokan to shitashin ri no joutai ha masani kore de aru .
yo ha akiraka ni nanigoto wo mo kangae te ora nu .
mata ha tashika ni nanimono wo mo ken te ora nu .
waga ishiki no butai ni choru shiki shikisai wo motsu te ugoku mono ga nai kara ,
ware ha ikanaru jibutsu ni douka shi ta to mo ie nu . saredo mo ware ha ugoi te iru .
yononaka ni ugoi te mo ora nu , yo no soto ni mo ugoi te ora nu .
tada nani to naku ugoi te iru . hana ni ugoku ni mo ara zu , tori ni ugoku ni mo ara zu ,
ningen ni taishi te ugoku ni mo ara zu , tada kou kotsu to ugoi te iru .
shiite setsumei seyo to unwa ruru nara ba ,
yo ga kokoro ha tada haru to tomo ni ugoi te iru to ii tai .
arayuru haru no shoku , haru no kaze , haru no mono ,
haru no koe wo utsu te , katame te , sen tanni neriage te ,
sore wo hourai no rei eki ni toi te , tougen no nichi de
jouhatsu se shime ta seiki ga , shira nu ma ni ke a na kara shimikon de , kokoro ga chikaku se nu uchi ni ho
uwa sa re te shimatsu ta to ii tai . futsuu no douka ni ha shigeki ga aru .
shigeki ga are ba koso , yukai de arou . yo no douka ni ha ,
nani to douka shi ta ka fu bun myou de aru kara , gou mo shigeki ga nai . shigeki ga nai kara ,
yo uzen to shi te meijou shi gatai tanoshimi ga aru .
kaze ni moma re te uwanosora naru nami wo okosu , keihaku de soozooshii omomuki to ha chigau .
me ni mie nu iku hiro no soko wo , tairiku kara tairiku made ugoi te iru
kou you taru sou kai no arisama to keiyou suru koto ga dekiru .
tada sore hodo ni katsuryoku ga nai bakari da . shikashi soko ni kaetsu te koufuku ga aru .
idai naru katsuryoku no hatsugen ha , kono katsuryoku ga
itsu ka kotogotoki hateru darou to no kenen ga komoru .
tsune no sugata ni ha sou iu shinpai ha tomonawa nu .
tsune yori ha tan kiwa ga kokoro no , ima no joutai ni ha ,
waga ha geshiki chikara no shou mashi ha se nu ka to no urei wo hanare taru nomi nara zu ,
tsune no kokoro no ka mo naku fuka mo naki bon sakai wo mo dakkyaku shi te iru .
tan shito ha tanni torae muzukashi to iu imi de , yowaki ni sugiru osore wo fukun de ha ora nu .
chuu yuu to ka tantou to ka iu shijin no go ha
mottomo kono kyou wo setsujitsu ni ii oose ta mono darou .
kono kyou gai wo e ni shi te ken tara dou darou to kangae ta .
shikashi futsuu no ga ni ha nara nai ni kimatsu te iru .
ware ra ga zoku ni ga to shousuru mono ha ,
tada gan zen no jinji fuukou wo arinomama naru sugata to shi te ,
moshikuha kore wo waga shinbi me ni roku ka shi te , egi nu no ue ni utsushi ta mono ni sugi nu .
hana ga hana to mie , mizu ga mizu to utsuri ,
jinbutsu ga jinbutsu to shi te katsudou sure ba , ga no no uji ha otsu ta mono to kangae rare te iru .
moshi kono ue ni itsu to uchi wo nuke ba , waga kanji taru busshou wo , waga kanji taru mama no omomuki wo soe te ,
gafu no ue ni rin ri to shi te sei dou sa seru . aru tokubetsu no kankyou wo ,
o no ga torae taru shin ra no uchi ni guusuru no ga
kono tane no gijutsu ie no shui de aru kara , kare ra no ken taru busshou kan ga
meiryou ni hittan ni hotobashitsu te ora ne ba , ga
wo seisaku shi ta to ha unwa nu . onore ha shikajika no koto wo ,
shikajika ni mi , shikajika ni kanji tari , sono mikata mo kanji hou mo ,
zenji n nori ka ni tachi te , korai no densetsu ni
shihai se rare taru ni ara zu , shikamo mottomo tadashiku shi te ,
mottomo bi ku shiki mono nari to no shuchou wo shimesu sakuhin ni ara zare ba , waga saku to iu wo aete se nu .
kono ni tane no seisaku ie ni shu kaku shinsen no kubetsu ha aru ka mo shire nu ga ,
meiryou naru gaikai no shigeki wo matsu te , hajime te te wo kudasu no ha souhou kyoudou ichi de aru . saredo ima ,
waga egaka n to suru daimoku ha , sahodo ni bun myou na mono de ha nai .
ara n kagiri no kankaku wo kobu shi te , kore wo shingai ni busshoku shi ta tokoro de ,
houen no katachi , kou roku no shoku ha muron , noutan no in ,
kou sen no suji wo midashi kaneru . waga kanji ha soto kara rai ta no de ha nai ,
tatoi rai ta to shi te mo , waga shikai ni yokotawaru ,
ittei no keibutsu de nai kara , kore ga gen i n da to
yubi wo age te akiraka ni nin ni shimesu wake ni ika nu . aru mono ha tada kokoromochi de aru .
kono kokoromochi wo , dou arawashi tara ga ni naru darou
-   iya kono kokoromochi wo ikanaru gutai wo kari te ,
nin no ga ten suru you ni houfutsu se shime eru ka ga mondai de aru .
futsuu no ga ha kanji ha naku te mo mono sae are ba dekiru .
dai ni no ga ha mono to kanji to ryouritsu sure ba dekiru . dai san ni itatsu te ha
sonsuru mono ha tada kokoromochi dake de aru kara , ga ni suru ni ha
zehi tomo kono kokoromochi ni kakkou naru taishou wo eraba nakere ba nara n .
shikaru ni kono taishou ha youi ni shutsu te rai nai . shutsu te rai te mo youi ni matomara nai .
matotsu te mo shizen kai ni sonsuru mono to ha marude omomuki wo koto ni suru baai ga aru .
shitagatsu te futsuu no nin kara mire ba ga to ha uketore nai .
egai ta tounin mo shizen kai no kyokubu ga saigen shi ta mono to ha mitome te ora n ,
tada kankyou no sashi ta kokka no kokoromochi wo ikubun de mo tsutae te , tashou no seimei wo
shou kyou shi gataki muudo ni youre ba dai seikou to kokoroe te iru . korai kara kono nan jigyou ni
zenzen no isaoshi wo osame e taru gakou ga aru ka nai ka shira nu .
aru ten made kono ryuu ha ni yubi wo some e taru mono wo a gure ba ,
bun yo ka no take de aru . un koku monka no sansui de aru .
kudatsu te tai ga dou no keishoku de aru . bu son no jinbutsu de aru .
tai sei no gaka ni itatsu te ha , ooku me wo gu shou sekai ni hase te ,
shin ou no kiin ni keitou se nu mono ga dai tasuu wo shime te iru kara ,
kono tane no hitsuboku ni butsu gai no shin in wo
tsutae eru mono ha hatashite ki nin aru ka shira nu .
oshii koto ni setsu shuu , buson ra no tsutome te byou shu tsu shi ta isshu no kiin ha ,
amari ni tanjun de katsu amari ni henka ni toboshii .
hitsuryoku no ten kara ie ba toutei kore ra no ooya ni oyobu wake ha nai ga ,
ima waga e ni shi te miyou to omou kokoromochi ha mou sukoshi fukuzatsu de aru .
fukuzatsu de aru dake ni dou mo ichi mai no naka he ha
kanji ga osamari kaneru . hoozue wo yame te ,
ryouude wo tsukue no ue ni kun de kangae ta ga yahari shutsu te rai nai .
shoku , katachi , choushi ga deki te , jibun no kokoro ga , aa koko ni i ta na to ,
tachimachi jiko wo ninshiki suru you ni kaka nakere ba nara nai .
ikiwakare wo shi ta waga ko wo tazuneateru tame , rokujuu yo shuu wo kai koku shi te ,
ne te mo same te mo , wasureru ma ga nakatsu ta aru nichi , juuji gaitou ni futo ka i kou shi te ,
inazuma no saegiru hima mo naki uchi ni , atsu , koko ni i ta , to omou you ni kaka nakere ba nara nai .
sore ga muzukashii . kono choushi sae dere ba ,
nin ga ken te nani to itsu te mo kamawa nai . ga de nai to nonoshira re te mo urami ha nai .
iyashiku mo shoku no haigou ga kono kokoromochi no ichibu wo daihyou shi te ,
sen no kyoku choku ga kono kiai no ikubun wo hyougen shi te , zentai no haichi ga kono fuu in no dore hodo ka wo tsutaeru nara ba ,
katachi ni araware ta mono ha , ushi de are uma de are ,
naishi ha ushi de mo uma de mo , nani de mo nai mono de are , itowa nai .
itowa nai ga dou mo deki nai . shasei chou wo tsukue no ue he oi te ,
ryougan ga jou no naka he ochikomu made , kufuu shi ta ga ,
totemo mono ni nara n . enpitsu wo oi te kangae ta . konna chuu shou teki na
kyoushu wo ga ni shiyou to suru no ga , somosomo no kan i de aru .
ningen ni sou kawari ha nai kara , ooku no nin no uchi ni ha
kitto jibun to onaji kankyou ni fure ta mono ga atsu te ,
kono kankyou wo nani ra no shudan ka de , eikyuu kasen to kokoromi ta ni soui nai .
kokoromi ta to sure ba sono shudan ha nani darou . tachimachi ongaku no ni ji ga pikari to me ni utsutsu ta .
naruhodo ongaku ha kakaru toki , kakaru hitsuyou ni semara re te umare ta shizen no koe de arou .
gaku ha kiku beki mono , narau beki mono de aru to , hajime te ki ga tsui ta ga ,
fukou ni shi te , sono hen no shousoku ha marude fu annai de aru . tsugi ni shi ni ha naru mai ka to ,
dai san no ryoubun ni fumikon de miru . resshingu to iu otoko ha ,
jikan no keika wo jouken to shi te okoru dekigoto wo , shi no honryou de aru gotoku ronji te ,
shiga ha fuitsu ni shi te ryouyou nari to no konpon gi wo tate ta you ni kioku suru ga ,
sou shi wo miru to , ima yo no happyou shiyou to asetsu te iru kyou gai mo
toutei mono ni nari sou ni nai . yo ga
ureshii to kanzuru shin ri no joukyou ni ha jikan ha aru ka mo shire nai ga , jikan no nagare ni sou te ,
teiji ni tenkai su beki dekigoto no naiyou ga nai .
ichi ga sari , ni ga ki tari , ni ga kie te
san ga uma ruru ga tame ni ureshii no de ha nai . hatsu kara you zen to shi te
dou sho ni ha juu suru omomuki de ureshii no de aru . sudeni dousho ni ha juusuru ijou ha ,
yoshi kore wo futsuu no gengo ni honyaku shi ta tokoro de ,
kanarazu shimo jikan teki ni zairyou wo anbai suru hitsuyou ha aru mai .
yahari kaiga to onajiku kuukan teki ni keibutsu wo haichi shi ta nomi de dekiru darou .
tada ikana rukei jou wo shi naka ni mochi rai tte , kono kouzen to shi te ki taku naki arisama wo
utsusu ka ga mondai de , sudeni kore wo torae e ta ijou ha
resshingu no setsu ni shitagawa n de mo shi to shi te seikou suru wake da . hoomaa ga dou de mo ,
vuaajiru ga dou de mo kamawa nai . moshi shi ga isshu no muudo wo arawasu ni tekishi te iru to sure ba , kono muudo ha
jikan no seigen wo uke te , junji nishin choku suru dekigoto no tasuke wo kara zu tomo ,
tanjun ni kuukan teki naru kaiga ue no youken wo
mitashi sae sure ba , gengo wo motsu te egaki eru mono to omou .
giron ha dou de mo yoi . rao koon nado ha
taigai wasure te iru no da kara , yoku shirabe tara , kotchi ga ayashiku naru ka mo shire nai .
tonikaku , enishi so ku natsu ta kara , ichi tsu shi ni shi te miyou , to shasei chou no ue he ,
enpitsu wo oshitsuke te , zengo ni mi wo yusubutsu te ken ta . shibaraku ha , fude no saki no togatsu ta tokoro wo ,
dou ni ka undou sa se tai bakari de , gou mo undou sa seru wake ni ika nakatsu ta .
kyuu ni hou yuu no mei wo shitsunen shi te , nodo made dekakatsu te iru no ni , shutsu te kure nai you na ki ga suru .
soko de akirameru to , de so ku natsu ta mei ha , tsuini hara no soko he osamatsu te shimau .
kuzu yu wo neru toki , saisho no uchi ha , sarasara shi te ,
hashi nite go tae ga nai mono da . soko wo shinbou suru to , youyaku nebari ga shutsu te ,
kakimazeru te ga sukoshi omoku naru . sore de mo kamawa zu , hashi wo yasuma se zu ni mawasu to ,
kondo ha mawashi kire naku naru . shimai ni ha
nabe no naka no kuzu ga , motome nu ni , senpou kara , arasotsu te hashi ni fuchaku shi te kuru .
shi wo tsukuru no ha masani kore da .
te gakari no nai enpitsu ga sukoshi zutsu ugoku you ni naru no ni sei wo e te ,
karekore nisanjuu fun shi tara , seishun nisan gatsu . shuu
ten kemuri jou take hari . to iu roku ku dake deki ta . yomikaeshi te miru to ,
mina ga ni nari sou na ku bakari de aru . kore nara hajime kara , ga
ni sure ba yokatsu ta to omou . naze ga yori mo shi no hou ga tsukuri yasukatsu ta ka to omou .
koko made shutsu tara , ato ha taishita ku mo naku shutsu sou da .
shikashi ga ni deki nai jou wo , tsugi ni ha utatsu te ken tai .
are ka , kore ka to omoiwazuratsu ta matsu toutou , dokuza mu sekigo .
housun nin bikou . ningen to taji .
ichi nichi sei . masatomo
men hakuun sato . to deki ta .
mou ippen saisho kara yominaoshi te miru to , chotto omoshiroku yoma reru ga ,
dou mo , jibun ga imashigata ha itsu ta kami sakai wo utsushi ta mono to suru to ,
sa kuzen to shi te mono tari nai . tsuide da kara , mou ichi kubi tsukutsu te miyou ka to ,
enpitsu wo nigitsu ta mama , nani no ki mo nashi ni , iriguchi no hou wo miru to ,
fusuma wo hii te , akehanatsu ta haba san shaku no kuukan wo
chirari to , kirei na kage ga kayotsu ta . hatena . yo ga
me wo tenji te , iriguchi wo ken ta toki ha , kirei na mono ga , sudeni hikihirake ta fusuma no kage ni
hanbun kakure kake te i ta . shikamo sono sugata ha
yo ga ken nu mae kara , ugoi te i ta mono rashiku , hatto omou kan ni tourikoshi ta .
yo ha shi wo sute te iriguchi wo mimamoru . ichi fun to tata nu kan ni ,
kage ha hantai no hou kara , gyaku ni araware te rai ta .
furi sode sugata no surari to shi ta onna ga , oto mo se zu , mukou ni kai no engawa wo
ja kunen to shi te arui te iku . yo ha oboe zu enpitsu wo otoshi te ,
hana kara sui kake ta iki wo pitari to tome ta .
hana gumori no sora ga , koku ikkoku ni ten kara , zuriochi te ,
ima ya furu to mata re taru yuugure no rankan ni ,
shitoyaka ni iki , shitoyaka ni kaeru furisode no kage ha , yo ga zashiki kara roku ken no nakaniwa wo hedate te ,
omoki kuuki no naka ni shou ryou to mie tsu , kakure tsu suru .
onna ha motoyori kuchi mo kika nu . wakime mo fura nu . en ni hiku suso no oto sae
o no ga mimi ni ira nu kurai shizuka ni arui te iru . koshi kara shita ni patsu to shokuzuku , suso moyou ha
nani wo somenui ta mono ka , tooku te wakara nu . tada mu ji to
moyou no tsunagaru naka ga , onozukara bokasa re te ,
yoru to hiru to no sakai no gotoki kokochi de aru .
onna ha motoyori yoru to hiru to no sakai wo arui te iru .
kono nagai furisode wo chaku te , nagai rouka wo nani do yuki nani do modoru ki ka ,
yo ni ha kai kara nu . itsugoro kara kono fushigi na yosooi wo shi te ,
kono fushigi na ayumi wo tsuzuke tsutsu aru ka mo , yo ni ha wakara nu .
sono shui ni itatsu te ha motoyori wakara nu . motoyori wakaru beki hazu nara nu koto wo ,
kaku made mo tansei ni , kaku made mo seishuku ni , kaku made mo do wo omone te
kurikaesu nin no sugata no , iriguchi ni araware te ha kie ,
kie te ha arawaruru toki no yo no kanji ha isshu iyou de aru . yuku haru no urami wo so uru sho sa nara ba
nani ga yue ni kaku hamu tonjaku naru . mu tonchaku naru shosa nara ba
nani ga yue ni kaku ha kira wo kazareru .
kure n to suru haru no shoku no , sen en to shi te ,
shibaraku ha mei baku no toguchi wo maboroshi ni irodoru naka ni , me
mo sa mu ru hodo no obi ji ha kinran ka .
azayaka naru orimono ha yuki tsu , modori tsu souzen taru yuube no naka ni tsutsuma re te ,
yuu geki no anata , ryou en no kashiko he ichi fun goto ni kie te saru . kirameki wataru haru no hoshi no ,
akatsuki chikaku ni , murasaki fukaki sora no soko ni ochiiru omomuki de aru .
tai gen no mon onozukara hirake te , kono hanayaka naru sugata wo ,
yuumei no fu ni suikoma n to suru toki , yo ha kou kanji ta .
kin byou wo se ni , gin shoku wo mae ni , haru no shou no ikkoku wo senkin to ,
sazameki kurashi te koso shikaru beki kono yosooi no ,
itou keshiki mo naku , arasou yousu mo mie zu , shiki sou sekai kara usure te iku no ha ,
aru ten ni oi te chou shizen no joukei de aru . kokukoku to semaru kuro ki kage wo ,
sukashi te miru to onna ha shukuzen to shi te , seki mo se zu , urotae mo se zu ,
onaji hodo no hochou wo motsu te , onaji tokoro wo haikai shi te iru rashii .
mi ni ochikakaru wazawai wo shira nu to sure ba
mujaki no kiwami de aru . shitsu te , sai to omowa nu nara ba monosugoi .
kuroi tokoro ga honrai no sumai de , shibaraku no maboroshi wo , moto no mama naru mei baku no uchi ni osamere ba koso ,
kayou ni kansei no taido de , utomu no aida ni shouyou shi te iru no darou .
onna no tsuke ta furisode ni , fun taru moyou no kotogotoki te , zehi mo naki suru sumi ni
nagarekomu atari ni , o no ga mi no su jou wo honomekashi te iru .
mata kou kanji ta . utsukushi ki nin ga , utsukushi ki nemuri ni tsui te ,
sono nemuri kara , sameru hima mo naku , utsutsu no mama de , konoyo no iki wo hikitoru toki ni ,
makuramoto ni yamai wo mamoru ware ra no kokoro ha sazo tsurai darou .
shiku hakku wo hyaku ku ni omone te shinu nara ba ,
ikigai no nai honnin ha motoyori , hata ni ken te iru shitashii nin mo korosu ga jihi to akirame rareru ka mo shire nai .
shikashi suyasuya to neiru ji ni shinu beki nani no toga ga arou .
nemuri nagara yomi ni tsure te ika reru no ha , shinu kakugo wo se nu uchi ni ,
damashi uchi ni seki shiki ichimei wo hatasu to douyou de aru .
douse korosu mono nara , totemo nogare nu jou gou to
tokushin mo sa se , dannen mo shi te , nenbutsu wo tonae tai . shinu beki jouken ga
sonawara nu saki ni , shinu ru jijitsu nomi ga , ariari to , tashikame raruru toki ni ,
namuamidabu tsuto e kou wo suru koe ga deru kurai nara , sono koe de oui oui to , nakaba
anoyo he ashi wo fumikon da mono wo , muri ni mo yobikaeshi taku naru .
kari no nemuri kara , itsu no mato mo kokorozuka nu uchi ni ,
nagai nemuri ni utsuru honnin ni ha , yobikaesa reru hou ga , kire kakatsu ta bonnou no tsuna wo
muyami ni hika ruru you de kurushii ka mo shire nu .
jihi da kara , yon de kureru na , odayaka ni nekashi te kure to omou ka mo shire nu .
sore de mo , wareware ha yobikaeshi taku naru .
yo ha kondo onna no sugata ga iriguchi ni araware ta nara ,
yobikake te , utsutsu no uchi kara sukutsu te yarou ka to omotsu ta .
shikashi yume no you ni , san shaku no haba wo ,
suu to nukeru kage wo miru ya ina ya , nani da ka kuchi ga kike naku naru .
kondo ha to kokoro wo sadame te iru uchi ni , suu to ku mo naku kayotsu te shimau . naze
nani to mo ie nu ka to kouuru totan ni , onna ha mata touru .
kochira ni ukagau nin ga atsu te , sono nin ga jibun no tame ni dore hodo yakimoki omou te iru ka ,
mijin mo ki ni kakara nu arisama de touru . mendou ni mo kinodoku ni mo , sho te kara ,
yo no gotoki mono ni , ki wo kane te ora nu arisama de touru .
kondo ha kondo ha to omou te iru uchi ni ,
korae kane ta , kumo no sou ga , mochi kire nu ame no ito wo ,
shimeyaka ni otoshi dashi te , onna no kage wo , shou shou to fuuji owaru .
shou owari kono rokuon ha
dandan wo , shi tsu oriru to , hachi tatami hodo na furoba he deru .
ishi ni fu jiyuu se nu kuni to mie te , shita ha mikage de shikitsume ta , mannaka wo
shi shaku bakari no shin sa ni horinui te , toufu ya hodo na yu bu ne wo sueru .
fune to ha iu mono no yahari ishi de tatamin de aru .
kousen to mei no tsuku ijou ha , iroiro na seibun wo fukun de iru no darou ga ,
shoku ga jun toumei da kara , hairi gokochi ga yoi . oriori ha
kuchi ni sae fukun de miru ga betsudan no aji mo nioi mo nai .
byouki ni mo kiku sou da ga , kii te ken nu kara ,
donna byou ni kiku no ka shira nu . motoyori betsudan no jibyou mo nai kara ,
jitsuyou ue no kachi ha katsute atama no naka ni ukan da koto ga nai .
tada ha iru do ni kangaedasu no ha ,
hakuraku ten no onsen mizu nameraka ni shi te gyou shi wo arau
to iu ku dake de aru . onsen to iu mei wo kike ba kanarazu kono ku ni araware ta you na
yukai na kimochi ni naru . mata kono kimochi wo dashi e nu onsen ha , onsen to shi te
mattaku kachi ga nai to omotsu teru . kono risou igai ni
onsen ni tsui te no chuumon ha marude nai . supori to tsukaru to , chichi no atari made ha iru . yu
ha doko kara wai te deru ka shira nu ga , tsune de mo fune no fuchi wo kirei ni koshi te iru .
haru no ishi ha kawaku hima naku nure te , atataka ni ,
fumu ashi no , kokoro ha odayaka ni ureshii . furu ame ha , yorunome wo kasume te ,
hisoka ni haru wo uruosu hodo no shimeyaka sa de aru ga ,
ken no shizuku ha , youyaku shigeku , potari , potari to mimi ni buneru .
tate kome rare ta yuge ha , yuka kara tenjou wo kumanaku uzume te ,
sukima sae are ba , fushi ana no sai ki wo itowa zu mo rei den to suru keshiki de aru .
aki no kiri ha hiyaka ni , tanabiku moya ha nodoka ni , yuuge taku , nin no kemuri ha aoku tatsu te ,
ooinaru sora ni , waga hakanaki sugata wo takusu . samazama no aware ha aru ga ,
haru no yo no de yu no kumori bakari ha , yuami suru mono no hada wo ,
yawaraka ni tsutsun de , furuki yo no otoko ka to , ware wo utagawa shimuru .
me ni utsuru mono no mie nu hodo , koku matsuwari ha se nu ga ,
usuginu wo hitoe yabure ba , nani no ku mo naku , gekai no nin to , onore wo ken dasu you ni ,
asaki mono de ha nai . ichi juu yaburi , ni juu yaburi , ki juu wo yaburi tsukusu tomo
kono keburi kara dasu koto ha nara nu kao ni , shihou yori ware hitori wo ,
atataka ki niji no uchi ni uzumesaru .
sake ni you to iu kotoba ha aru ga , keburi ni you to iu goku wo mimi ni shi ta koto ga nai .
aru to sure ba , kiri ni ha muron tsukae nu ,
kasumi ni ha sukoshi kyou sugiru . tada kono moya ni ,
shun shou no ni ji wo kanshi taru toki , hajime te datou naru wo oboeru . yo ha
yu bu ne no fuchi ni aomuke no atama wo sasae te ,
sukitooru yu no naka no karo ki karada wo , dekiru dake
teikou chikara naki atari he tadayowashi te ken ta .
fuwari , fuwari to tamashii ga kurage no you ni ui te iru . yononaka mo konna ki ni nare ba
raku na mono da . funbetsu no jou mae wo ake te , shuu ja ku no shinbari wo hazusu .
dou to mo seyo to , yu no naka de , yu to douka shi te shimau .
nagareru mono hodo ikiru ni ku ha ira nu .
nagareru mono no naka ni , tamashii made nagashi te ire ba ,
kirisuto no o deshi to natsu ta yori arigatai .
naruhodo kono choushi de kangaeru to , dozaemon ha fuuryuu de aru .
suuinbaan no nani to ka iu shi ni , onna ga mizu no soko de oujou shi te
ureshi gatsu te iru kanji wo kai te atsu ta to omou . yo ga heizei kara ku ni shi te i ta ,
miree no oferiya mo , kou kansatsu suru to daibu utsukushiku naru .
nani de anna fu yukai na tokoro wo eran da mono ka to ima made fushin ni omotsu te i ta ga ,
are ha yahari e ni naru no da . mizu ni ukan da mama ,
aruiha mizu ni shizun da mama , aruiha shizun dari ukan dari shi ta mama ,
tada sono mama no sugata de ku nashi ni nagareru arisama ha
biteki ni soui nai . sore de ryougan ni
iroiro na kusabana wo ashiratsu te , mizu no shoku to
nagare te iku nin no kao no shoku to , ifuku no shoku ni ,
ochitsui ta chouwa wo totsu ta nara , kitto ga ni naru ni soui nai . shikashi nagare te iku nin no hyoujou ga ,
marude heiwa de ha hotondo shinwa ka hiyu ni natsu te shimau . keiren teki naku mon ha motoyori ,
zenpuku no seishin wo uchikowasu ga , zenzen iro ke no nai heiki na kao de ha
ninjou ga utsura nai . donna kao wo kai tara seikou suru darou .
miree no oferiya ha seikou ka mo shire nai ga ,
kare no seishin ha yo to onaji tokoro ni sonsuru ka utagawashii . miree ha miree ,
yo ha yo de aru kara , yo ha yo no kyoumi wo motsu te , ichi tsu fuuryuu na dozaemon wo kai te ken tai .
shikashi omou you na kao ha sou tayasuku kokoro ni ukan de rai sou mo nai . yu no naka ni ui ta mama , kondo ha
dozaemon no san wo tsukutsu te miru . ame ga futsu tara nureru darou .
shimo ga ori tara tsumetakaro . tsuchi no shita de ha kurakarou .
ukaba nami no ue , shizuma ba nami no soko , haru no mizu nara ku ha nakaro .
to kuchi no uchi de kogoe ni ju shi tsutsu manze n to ui te iru to ,
doko ka de hiku shami sen no ne ga buneru . bijutsu ie da no ni to
unwa reru to kyoushuku suru ga , mi no tokoro ,
yo ga kono gakki ni oke ru chishiki ha sukoburu ayashii mono de ni ga agarou ga , san ga sagarou ga ,
mimi ni ha amari eikyou wo uke ta tameshi ga nai . shikashi , shizuka na haru no yoru ni ,
ame sae kyou wo soeru , yamazato no yu tsubo no naka de , tamashii made haru no de yu ni ukashi nagara ,
tooku no shami wo mu sekinin ni kiku no ha hanahada ureshii .
tooi kara nani wo utatsu te , nani wo hii te iru ka muron wakara nai .
soko ni nani da ka omomuki ga aru . neiro no ochitsui te iru tokoro kara sassuru to ,
kami gata no ken gyousan no ji u tani de mo kika re sou na
futo zao ka to mo omou . kodomo no jibun ,
monzen ni yorozu ya to iu sakaya ga atsu te , soko ni okurasa n to iu musume ga i ta .
kono o kura san ga , shizuka na haru no hirusugi ni naru to ,
cha hatake no juu tsubo amari wo mae ni hikae te , san hon no matsu ga ,
kyakuma no higashigawa ni naran de iru . kono matsu ha
mawari ichi shaku mo aru ookina ki de , omoshiroi koto ni ,
san hon yotsu te , hajime te omomuki no aru kakkou wo katachi tsukutsu te i ta .
kodomo kokoro ni kono matsu wo miru to yoi kokoromochi ni naru .
matsu no shita ni kuroku sabi ta ka na dou rou ga mei no shire nu akaishi no ue ni ,
itsu ken te mo , wakara zu ya no katakuna jijii no you ni kataku matsu te iru .
yo ha kono tourou wo kentsumeru no ga daisuki de atsu ta .
tourou no zengo ni ha , koke fukaki chi wo nui te ,
mei mo shira nu haru no kusa ga , ukiyo no kaze wo shira nu kao ni ,
hitori niou te hitori tanoshin de iru . yo ha kono kusa no naka ni ,
wazuka ni hiza wo i ruru no seki wo midashi te ,
jitto , shagamu no ga kono jibun no kuse de atsu ta .
kono san hon no matsu no shita ni , kono tourou wo nirame te , kono kusa no ka wo kai de , sou shi te o
kura san no nagauta wo tooku kara kiku no ga , touji no nikka de atsu ta .
o kura san ha mou akai tegara no jidai sae tourikoshi te ,
daibun to shotai jimi ta kao wo , chouba he sarashi teru darou . muko to ha
ori ai ga ii ka shira n . tsubakuro ha nennen kaetsu te rai te ,
doro wo fukun da kuchibashi wo , isogashi ge ni hatarakashi te iru ka shira n .
tsubame to sake no ka to ha dou shi te mo souzou kara kirihanase nai .
san hon no matsu ha imada ni ii kakkou de nokotsu te iru kashiran .
tetsu tourou ha mou koware ta ni soui nai . haru no kusa ha , mukashi , shagan da nin wo oboe te iru darou ka .
sono toki de sura , kuchi mo kika zu ni sugi ta mono wo , ima ni mishirou hazu ga nai .
okura san no tabi no koromo ha suzukake no
to iu , higo to no koe mo yomo kikioboe ga aru to ha iu mai .
sha mi no ne ga omowa nu panorama wo yo no gan zen ni tenkai suru ni tsuke ,
yo ha yukashii kako no manoatari ni tatsu te , nijuu nen no mukashi ni sumu , gan ze naki kozou to , narisumashi ta toki ,
totsuzen furoba no ko ga sarari to ai ta .
dare ka rai ta na to , mi wo ukashi ta mama , shisen dake wo iriguchi ni sosogu .
yu bu ne no fuchi no mottomo iriguchi kara , hedatari taru ni
atama wo nose te iru kara , fune ni kudaru dandan ha ,
aida ni take wo hedate te naname ni yo ga me ni iru .
shikashi miage taru yo no hitomi ni ha mada nanimono mo utsura nu .
shibaraku ha ken wo meguru a ma dare no oto nomi ga buneru .
shami sen ha itsu no ma ni ka yan de i ta .
yagate kaidan no ue ni nanimono ka araware ta .
hiroi furoba wo terasu mono ha , tada ichi tsu no shou saki tsuri ranpu nomi de aru kara ,
kono kakuri de ha sumi kitsu ta kuuki wo hikae te sae ,
shikato butsu shoku ha muzukashii . mashite tachiagaru yuge no ,
komayaka naru ame ni osae rare te , nige ba wo ushinai taru koyoi no furo ni ,
tatsu wo dare to ha motoyori sadame nikui . ichidan wo kudari , ni dan wo fun de ,
matomo ni , terasu hoka ge wo abi taru toki de naku te ha ,
otoko tomo onna tomo koe ha kake rare nu .
kuroi mono ga ichi ho wo shita he utsushi ta .
fumu ishi ha biroudo no gotoku yawaraka to mie te ,
ashioto wo shou ni kore wo rissure ba , ugoka nu to hyoushi te mo sashitsukae nai .
ga rinkaku ha sukoshiku ukiagaru . yo ha gakou dake atsu te jintai no kokkaku ni tsui te ha ,
zongai shikaku ga eibin de aru . nani to mo shire nu mono no ichidan ugoi ta toki ,
yo ha onna to futari , kono furoba no naka ni aru koto wo satotsu ta .
chuui wo shi ta mono ka , se nu mono ka to , uki nagara kangaeru kan ni ,
onna no kage ha ikan naku , yo ga mae ni , hayaku mo araware ta .
minagiri wataru yu keburi no , yawaraka na kousen wo
ichi bun shi goto ni fukun de , usu kure nai no atataka ni mieru oku ni ,
tadayowasu kurokami wo kumo to nagashi te , ara n kagiri no setake wo ,
surari to noshi ta onna no sugata wo ken ta toki ha , reigi no , sa hou no , fuuki no to iu kanji ha kotogotoku ,
waga no uri wo satsu te , tada hitasura ni , utsukushii gadai wo midashi e ta to nomi omotsu ta .
kodai girisha no choukoku ha iza shira zu ,
kin sei futsu koku no gaka ga inochi to tanomu ratai ga wo miru tabi ni , amari ni akarasama na niku no bi wo ,
doko to naku kiin ni toboshii kokoromochi ga , ima made ware wo kurushime te nara nakatsu ta .
shikashi sono oriori ha tada doko to naku gehin da to hyousuru made de ,
naze gehin de aru ka ga , wakara nu yue , ware shira zu ,
kotae wo eru ni hanmon shi te konnichi ni itatsu ta no darou .
niku wo ooe ba , utsukushi kimono ga kakureru .
kakusa ne ba iyashiku naru . ima no yo no ratai ga to iu ha
tada kakusa nu to iu iyashi sa ni , gikou wo todome te ora nu .
koromo wo ubai taru sugata wo , sono mama ni utsusu dake nite ha ,
mono tara nu to mie te , akumade mo hadaka wo , ikan no yo ni oshidasou to suru .
fuku wo tsuke taru ga , ningen no joutai naru wo wasure te ,
akahadaka ni subete no kennou wo fuyo se n to kokoromiru .
juubun de kototaru beki wo , juu ni bun ni mo , juu go bun ni mo ,
doko made mo susun de , hitasura ni , ratai de aru zo to iu kanji wo tsuyoku byou shu tsu shiyou to suru .
gikou ga kono kyokutan ni tasshi taru toki , nin ha sono kan ja wo shi uru wo routo suru .
utsukushi kimono wo , iya ga ue ni , utsukushiku se n to aseru toki , utsukushi kimono ha kaette sono do wo genzuru ga rei de aru .
jinji ni tsui te mo man ha son wo maneku to no kotowaza ha kore ga tame de aru . hou
shinto mujaki to ha yoyuu wo shimesu . yoyuu ha e ni oi te ,
shi ni oi te , moshikuha bunshou ni oi te , hitsu suu no jouken de aru . kin dai ge i ju tsu no ichidai hei tou ha ,
iwayuru bunmei no chouryuu ga , itazura ni geijutsu no samurai wo katsu te , ku ku to shi te zuisho ni
a kuso ku tara shimuru ni aru . ratai ga ha sono kourei de arou .
tokai ni ge i gi to iu mono ga aru . shoku wo uri te , nin ni kobiru wo shoubai ni shi te iru .
kare ra ha hyou kaku ni taisuru toki , waga youshi no ikani aite no hitomi ni eizuru ka wo
kori yo suru no hoka , nani ra no hyoujou wo mo hakkishi e nu . nennen ni miru saron no mokuroku ha
kono geigi ni ji taru ratai bijin wo i te juuman shi te iru .
kare ra ha ichi byou toki mo , waga ratai naru wo wasururu atawa zaru nomi nara zu ,
zenshin no kinniku wo mu zutsu ka shi te , waga ratai naru wo kansha ni shimesa n to tsutome te iru .
ima yo ga menzen ni hyou tei to araware taru sugata ni ha ,
ichi chiri mo kono zoku ai no me ni saegiru mono wo obi te ora nu .
tsune no nin no matoeru ishou wo nugisute taru sama to ie ba sudeni ningai ni da zai suru .
hajime yori kiru beki fuku mo , furu beki sode mo ,
aru mono to shira zaru ka miyo no sugata wo kumo no naka ni
yobiokoshi taru ga gotoku shizen de aru . shitsu wo uzu mu ru yukemuri ha ,
ume tsukushi taru ato kara , tae zu wakiagaru . haru no yo no hi wo han toumei ni kuzushi hiroge te ,
heya ichimen no niji no sekai ga komayaka ni yureru naka ni ,
mourou to , kuro ki ka to mo omowa ruru hodo no kami wo bokashi te ,
masshiro na sugata ga kumo no soko kara shidai ni ukiagatsu te kuru .
sono rinkaku wo miyo . kubisuji wo ka roku uchiwa ni , souhou kara seme te ,
ku mo naku kata no hou he nadareochi ta sen ga , yutaka ni , maruku ore te , nagaruru matsu ha
go hon no yubi to wakareru no de arou . fukkura to uku ni tsu no chichi no shita ni ha ,
shibashi hiku nami ga , mata nameraka ni morikaeshi te
kafuku no hari wo yasuraka ni miseru . haru ikioi wo ushiro he nui te , sei
no jin kuru atari kara , wakare ta niku ga heikou wo tamotsu tame ni sukoshiku mae ni katamuku .
gyaku ni ju kuru hizagashira no kono tabi ha , tatenaoshi te ,
nagaki uneri no kakato ni tsuku goro , hira taki ashi ga , subete no kattou wo ,
ni mai no ashi no ura ni an(kurikaesi) to shimatsu suru .
yononaka ni kore hodo saku za tsu shi ta haigou ha nai ,
kore hodo touitsu no aru haigou mo nai . kore hodo shizen de ,
kore hodo yawaraka de , kore hodo teikou no sukunai , kore hodo
ku ni nara nu rinkaku ha kesshite midase nu .
shikamo kono sugata ha futsuu no ratai no gotoku rokotsu ni ,
yo ga me no mae ni tsukitsuke rare te ha ora nu . subete no mono wo yuugen ni kasuru
isshu no rei fun no naka ni houfutsu to shi te , juubun no bi wo okuyukashiku mo
honomekashi te iru ni sugi nu . hen rin wo
hatsu boku rin ri no aida ni tenji te , kyuu ryou no kai wo ,
cho gou no hoka ni souzou se shimuru ga gotoku , geijutsu teki ni kanji te moushibun no nai ,
teinei ni egaki taru ryuu no , kokkei ni otsuru ga jijitsu nara ba ,
sekirara no niku wo jou shasha ni nagame nu uchi ni
katsura no miyako wo nogare ta getsu kai no jou ga ga ,
niji no otsu te ni torikakoma re te , shibaraku chuucho suru sugata to nagame ta .
rinkaku ha shidai ni shiroku ukiagaru .
imaichi ho wo fumidase ba , sekkaku no jou ga ga , aware ,
zokukai ni daraku suru yo to omou setsuna ni , midori no kami ha , nami wo kiru
rei ki no o no gotoku ni kaze wo okoshi te , bouto nabii ta . uzumaku keburi wo tsunzai te ,
shiroi sugata ha kaidan wo tobiagaru . hoho hoho to surudoku warau onna no koe ga ,
rouka ni hibii te , shizuka naru furoba wo shidai ni mukou he toonoku . yo ha gaburi to yu wo non da mama
fune no naka ni tsuttatsu . odoroi ta nami ga , mune he ataru .
fuchi wo kosu yu no oto ga saasaa to naru . shou owari
ai kyaku ha sou hitori , kan ka iji no o shou de
mei ha dai tetsu to iu sou da . zoku hitori ,
nijuu shi go no wakai otoko de aru . roujin no heya ha ,
yo ga shitsu no rouka wo migi he tsukiatsu te ,
hidari he ore ta iki domari ni aru . ooki sa ha roku tatami mo arou .
ookina shi tan no tsukue wo mannaka ni sue te aru kara ,
omotsu ta yori semakurushii . sore he to iu seki wo miru to , futon no kawari ni katan ga shii te aru .
muron shina sei darou . mannaka wo rokkaku ni shikitsu te ,
myou na ie to , myou na yanagi ga oridashi te aru . mawari ha tetsuiro ni chikai ai de ,
yo sumi ni karaku sa no moyou wo kazatsu ta cha no wa wo somenui te aru .
shina de ha kore wo zashiki ni mochii ta mono ka utagawashii ga ,
kou yatsu te futon ni daiyou shi te miru to sukoburu omoshiroi . indo no sara sa to ka ,
perusha no kabe kake to ka gousuru mono ga , chotto ma ga nuke te iru tokoro ni kachi ga aru gotoku ,
baka de ki no nagai jinshu no hatsumei shi ta mono to hoka tore nai .
ken te iru uchi ni , bootto suru tokoro ga toutoi .
nippon ha kinchaku kiri no taido de bijutsu hin wo tsukuru .
seiyou ha ookiku te komakaku te , sou shi te
doko made mo shaba kke ga tore nai . mazu kou kangae nagara seki ni tsuku .
oshou ha tora no kawa no ue he matsu ta .
tora no kawa no shippo ga yo no hiza no bou wo tourikoshi te ,
atama ha roujin no shiri no shita ni shika re te iru .
roujin ha atama no ke wo kotogotoku nui te ,
hoo to ago he ishoku shi ta you ni , shiroi hige wo mushamusha to hayashi te ,
cha taku he nose ta chawan wo teinei ni tsukue no ue he naraberu .
( kyou ha hisashi furi de , uchi he o kyaku ga mie ta kara , o cha wo ageyou to omotsu te ,
… … ) to bou san no hou wo muku to , ( iya , o tsukai wo arigatou .
washi mo , daibu go bu sata wo shi ta kara , kyou gurai rai te miyou ka to omotsu totsu ta tokoro ja
) to iu . kono sou ha rokujuu chikai , marugao no ,
daruma wo sou sho ni kuzushi ta you na youbou wo yuushi te iru .
roujin to ha fudan kara no jikkon to mieru . ( konokata ga o kyaku san ka na
) roujin ha unazuki nagara , shu de i no kyuusu kara ,
midori wo fukumu kohaku iro no gi yo kue ki wo , ni san shizuku zutsu , chawan no soko he shitatarasu .
kiyoi kaori ga kasuka ni hana wo osou kibun ga shi ta .
( konna inaka ni hitori de ha o samishikaro ) to o shou ha sugu yo ni hanashikake ta .
( ha aa ) to nan tomo ka to mo youryou wo e nu henji wo suru . sabishii to ie ba , itsuwari de aru .
sabishi kara zu to ie ba , nagai setsumei ga iru . ( nan no , oshou san .
kono kata ha e wo kaka reru tame ni rai rare ta no ja kara , o isogashii kurai ja ) ( o
o sayou ka , sore ha kekkou da . yahari nan sou ha ka na ) ( iie ) to kondo ha kotae ta .
nishi youga da nado to itsu te mo , kono oshou ni ha wakaru mai . ( iya , rei no nishi youga ja
) to roujin ha , shujin yaku ni , mata hanbun hikiuke te kureru .
( hahaa , youga ka . suru to , ano kyuu ichi san no yara reru you na mono ka na .
are ha , washi kono kan hajime te ken ta ga , zuibun kirei ni kake ta nou
) ( ie , najira n mono desu ) to wakai otoko ga kono toki youyaku kuchi wo hirai ta .
( omae nani zo oshou san ni ken te itadai ta ka
) to roujin ga wakai otoko ni kiku . kotoba kara iu te mo ,
yousu kara iu te mo , dou mo shinrui rashii .
( naani , ken te itadai ta n ja nai desu ga ,
kagami ga ike de shasei shi te iru tokoro wo oshou san ni mitsukatsu ta no desu
) ( fun , sou ka     saa o cha ga tsuge ta kara , ippai ) to roujin ha
chawan wo meimei no mae ni oku . cha no ryou ha san shi shizuku ni sugi nu ga ,
chawan ha sukoburu ookii . nama kabe iro no chi he ,
koge tatan to , usui ki de , e da ka , moyou da ka ,
oni no men no moyou ni nari kakatsu ta tokoro ka , chotto kentou no tsuka nai mono ga , beta ni kai te aru .
( moku bee desu ) to roujin ga kantan ni setsumei shi ta .
( kore ha omoshiroi ) to yo mo kantan ni home ta . ( mokubee ha dou mo nisemono ga ooku te ,
-   sono i to zoko wo ken te goran nasai . mei ga aru kara ) to iu . toriage te , shouji no hou he muke te miru .
shouji ni ha ueki hachi no haran no kage ga atataka sou ni utsutsu te iru .
kubi wo mage te , nozokikomu to , moku no ji ga chiisaku mieru . mei
ha kanshou no ue ni oi te , sa nomi taisetsu no mono to ha omowa nai ga ,
kou zu sha ha yohodo kore ga ki ni kakaru sou da .
chawan wo shita he oka nai de , sono mama kuchi he tsuke ta .
koku amaku , yuka genni shutsu ta , omoi tsuyu wo ,
shita no saki he ichi shizuku zutsu otoshi te ajiwatsu te miru no ha
kanjin teki i no in ji de aru . futsuu no nin ha cha wo nomu mono to kokoroe te iru ga ,
are ha kan i da . ze tsu tou he potari to nose te ,
kiyoi mono ga shihou he chire ba nodo he kudaru beki eki ha hotondo nai .
tada fukuiku taru nioi ga shokudou kara i no naka he shimi wataru nomi de aru .
ha wo mochiiru ha iyashii . mizu ha amari ni karui . gi
yo kuro ni itatsu te ha komayaka naru koto , tan sui no kyou wo dasshi te , ago wo tsukarasu hodo no kata sa wo shira zu .
kekkou na inryou de aru . nemura re nu to so uru mono ara ba , nemura nu mo ,

tokai ha taihei no tami wo koji ki to machigae te , suri no oyabun taru tantei ni takai geppou wo harau tokoro de aru .
yo ha kusa wo shitone ni taihei no shiri wo sorori to oroshi ta .

fune ha youyaku machi rashii naka he hairu . koshi shouji ni

kisha hodo nijuu seiki no bunmei wo daihyou suru mono ha aru mai .
nanbyaku to iu ningen wo onaji hako he tsume te gou to touru . nasake you sha ha nai .

nin ha kisha de iku to iu . yo ha unpan sa reru to iu . kisha hodo kosei wo keibetsu shi ta mono ha nai .
bunmei ha arayuru kagiri no shudan wo tsukushi te , kosei wo hattatsu se shime taru nochi , arayuru kagiri no houhou ni yotsu te kono kosei wo fumitsukeyou to suru .
hitori ma e nani tsubo nani gou ka no jimen wo atae te , kono jimen no uchi de ha neru tomo okiru tomo katte ni seyo to iu no ga genkon no bunmei de aru .
douji ni kono nani tsubo nani gou no shuui nite tsu saku wo mouke te , kore yori saki he ha ichi ho mo shutsu te ha nara nu zo to odokasu no ga genkon no bunmei de aru .
nani tsubo nani gou no uchi de jiyuu wo hoshiimama ni shi ta mono ga ,
kono tessaku soto ni mo jiyuu wo sen ni shi taku naru no ha shizen no ikioi de aru .
awaremu beki bunmei no kokumin ha nichiya ni kono tessaku ni kamitsui te hou kou shi te iru .
bunmei ha kojin ni jiyuu wo atae te tora no gotoku take kara shime taru nochi , kore wo kansei no nai ni nagekon de , tenka no heiwa wo iji shi tsutsu aru . kono heiwa ha makoto no heiwa de ha nai .
doubutsu sono no tora ga kenbutsu nin wo nirame te , nekoron de iru to douyou na heiwa de aru .

roujin mo ani san mo , nami san mo , yo mo soto ni tatsu te iru .
sharin ga ichi tsu maware ba hisaichi san ha sudeni ware ra ga yo no nin de ha nai . tooi , tooi sekai he itsu te shimau .
sono sekai de ha e n shou no nioi no naka de , nin ga hatarai te iru . sou shi te akai mono ni subetsu te , muyami ni korobu .
sora de ha ookina oto ga dodon dodon to iu .
kore kara sou iu tokoro he iku hisaichi san ha kuruma no naka ni tatsu te mugon no mama , ware(kurikaesi) wo nagame te iru .
ware(kurikaesi) wo yama no naka kara hikidashi ta hisaichi san to , hikidasa re ta ware(kurikaesi) no in ga ha koko de kireru . mou sudeni kire kakatsu te iru .
kuruma no ko to mado ga ai te iru dake de , o tagai no kao ga mieru dake de ,
iku nin to tomaru nin no kan ga roku shaku bakari hedatatsu te iru dake de , inga ha mou kire kakatsu te iru .
shashou ga , pishari pishari to ko wo tate nagara , kochira he hashitsu te kuru . ichi tsu hei teru goto ni , iku nin to , okuru nin no kyori ha masumasu tooku naru .
yagate hisaichi san no shashitsu no ko mo pishari to shimatsu ta . sekai ha mou ni tsu ni natsu ta .
roujin ha omowa zu madogiwa he yoru . seinen ha mado kara kubi wo dasu .
( abunai . shutsu masu yo ) to iu koe no shita kara , miren no nai te tsu sha no oto ga
go tsu tori go tsu tori to choushi wo totsu te ugoki dasu .
mado ha ichi tsu ichi tsu , wareware no mae wo touru .
hisaichi san no kao ga chiisaku natsu te , saigo no san nado ressha ga , yo no mae wo touru toki , mado no naka kara , mata ichi tsu kao ga shutsu ta .
chairo no hage ta nakaore bou no shita kara , hige darake na no bushi ga nagori oshi ge ni kubi wo dashi ta . sono toki , nami san to no bushi ha
omowa zu kao wo miawase ta . tessha ha gotori gotori to unten suru . no bushi no kao ha sugu kie ta .
nami san ha bouzen to shi te , iku kisha wo miokuru . sono bouzen no uchi ni ha fushigi ni mo
ima made katsute ken ta koto no nai ( aware ) ga ichimen ni ui te iru .
( sore da !   sore da !   sore ga dere ba e ni nari masu yo ) to yo ha
nami san no kata wo tataki nagara kogoe ni itsu ta .
yo ga kyouchuu no gamen ha kono tossa no kiwa ni jou ju shi ta no de aru . shou
owari
ichi oya yuzuri no mu teppou de kodomo no toki kara son bakari shi te iru .
shou gakkou ni iru jibun gakkou no ni kai kara tobiori te
ichi shuukan hodokoshi wo nukashi ta koto ga aru .
naze sonna muyami wo shi ta to kiku nin ga aru ka mo shire nu .
betsudan fukai riyuu de mo nai . shinchiku no ni kai kara kubi wo dashi te i tara ,
doukyuu nama no hitori ga joudan ni , ikura ibatsu te mo ,
soko kara tobioriru koto ha deki mai . yowamushi yaai . to hayashi ta kara de aru .
kozukai ni fubusatsu te kaetsu te rai ta toki , oyaji ga ookina me wo shi te ni kai gurai kara tobiori te
koshi wo nukasu yatsu ga aru ka to itsu ta kara , kono tsugi ha nukasa zu ni ton de mise masu to kotae ta .
shinrui no mono kara seiyou sei no naifu wo moratsu te
kirei na ha wo nichi ni kazashi te , tomodachi ni mise te i tara ,
hitori ga hikaru koto ha hikaru ga kire sou mo nai to itsu ta . kire nu koto ga aru ka ,
nani de mo kitsu te miseru to ukeatsu ta . son nara kun no yubi wo kitsu te miro to chuumon shi ta kara ,
nani da yubi gurai kono touri da to migi no te no oyayubi no kou wo hasu ni kirikon da .
saiwai naifu ga chiisai no to , oyayubi no hone ga katakatsu ta no de ,
ima dani oyayubi ha te ni tsui te iru . shikashi kizuato ha shinu made kie nu .
niwa wo higashi he nijuu ho ni iki tsukusu to ,
minami agari ni isasaka bakari no saien ga atsu te ,
mannaka ni kuri no ki ga ichi hon tatsu te iru .
kore ha inochi yori daiji na kuri da . mi no jukusuru jibun ha
okinuke ni se do wo shutsu te ochi ta yatsu wo hirotsu te ki te ,
gakkou de kuu . saien no nishigawa ga yamashiro ya to iu shichiya no niwa tsuzuki de ,
kono shichiya ni kan tarou to iu juu san shi no segare ga kyo ta .
kantarou ha muron yowamushi de aru .
yowamushi no kuse ni shi tsu me kaki wo norikoe te , kuri wo nusumi ni kuru .
aru nichi no yuugata ori dono kage ni kakure te ,
toutou kantarou wo tsuramae te yatsu ta .
sono toki kantarou ha nige michi wo utsu te , isshou kenmei ni tobikakatsu te ki ta .
mukou ha ni tsu bakari toshiue de aru . yowamushi da ga chikara ha tsuyoi .
hachi no hirai ta atama wo , kotchi no mune he ate te
guigui oshi ta hyoushi ni , kantarou no atama ga subetsu te ,
ore no awase no sode no naka ni haitsu ta .
jama ni natsu te te ga tsukae nu kara ,
muan ni te wo futsu tara , sode no naka ni aru kantarou no atama ga , migihidari he guragura nabii ta .
shimai ni kurushi gatsu te sode no naka kara , ore no ni no ude he kuitsui ta .
itakatsu ta kara kantarou wo kakine he oshitsuke te oi te ,
ashigara wo kake te mukou he taoshi te yatsu ta .
yamashiro ya no jimen ha saien yori roku shaku gata hikui .
kantarou ha shi tsu me kaki wo hanbun kuzushi te ,
jibun no ryoubun he matsu sakasama ni ochi te , guu to itsu ta .
kantarou ga ochiru toki ni , ore no awase no katasode ga moge te ,
kyuu ni te ga jiyuu ni natsu ta . sono ban
haha ga yamashiro ya ni wabi ni itsu ta tsuide ni awase no katasode mo torikaeshi te rai ta .
kono soto itazura ha ooita yatsu ta .
daiku no ka ne kou to sakanaya no kaku wo tsure te ,
mo saku no ninjin batake wo arashi ta koto ga aru .
ninjin no me ga desorowa nu tokoro he wara ga ichimen ni shii te atsu ta kara ,
sono ue de san nin ga hannichi sumou wo tori tsuzuke ni totsu tara ,
ninjin ga minna fumitsubusa re te shimatsu ta .
furu kawa no motsu te iru tanbo no ido wo ume te shiri wo mochikoma re ta koto mo aru .
futoi mou sou no fushi wo nui te , fukaku ume ta naka kara
mizu ga wakishutsu te , soko ira no ine ni mizu ga kakaru shikake de atsu ta .
sono jibun ha donna shikake ka shira nu kara ,
ishi yabo uchi gire wo gyuugyuu ido no naka he sashikon de ,
mizu ga shutsu naku natsu ta no wo mitodoke te , uchi he kaetsu te meshi wo kutsutsu te i tara ,
furukawa ga makka ni natsu te donarikon de rai ta .
tashika batsu kin wo dashi te sun da you de aru .
oyaji ha chittomo ore wo kawai gatsu te kure nakatsu ta .
haha ha ani bakari hiiki ni shi te i ta .
kono ani ha ya ni shoku ga shiroku tte , shibai no mane wo shi te
onna gata ni naru no ga suki datsu ta . ore wo miru do ni
koitsu ha douse rokuna mono ni ha nara nai to , oyaji ga itsu ta .
ranbou de ranbou de iku saki ga anji rareru to haha ga itsu ta .
naruhodo rokuna mono ni ha nara nai .
goran no touri no shimatsu de aru . yukusaki ga anji rare ta no mo muri ha nai .
tada chou eki ni ika nai de iki te iru bakari de aru .
haha ga byouki de shinu ni san chi mae daidokoro de chuugaeri wo shi te
hettsui no kaku de abara bone wo utsu te ooini itakatsu ta .
haha ga taisou okotsu te , omae no you na mono no kao ha ken taku nai to iu kara ,
shinrui he tomari ni itsu te i ta . suru to toutou shin da to iu shirase ga rai ta .
sou hayaku shinu to ha omowa nakatsu ta . sonna taibyou nara ,
mou sukoshi otonashiku sure ba yokatsu ta to omotsu te kaetsu te rai ta .
sou shi tara rei no ani ga ore wo oya fukou da ,
ore no tame ni , otsu kasan ga hayaku shin da n da to itsu ta .
kuyashikatsu ta kara , ani no yokottsura wo hatsu te taihen shikara re ta .
haha ga shin de kara ha , oyaji to ani to san nin de kurashi te i ta .
oyaji ha nanini mo se nu otoko de , nin no kao sae mire ba
kisama ha dame da dame da to kuchiguse no you ni itsu te i ta .
nani ga dame na n da ka ima ni wakara nai . myou na oyaji ga atsu ta mon da .
ani ha jitsugyou ie ni naru to ka itsu te shikiri ni eigo wo benkyou shi te i ta .
ganrai onna no you na shoubun de , zurui kara , naka ga yoku nakatsu ta .
juu nichi ni ippen gurai no wari de kenka wo shi te i ta .
aru toki shougi wo sashi tara hikyou na machi goma wo shi te , nin ga komaru to ureshi sou ni hiyakashi ta .
anmari hara ga tatsu ta kara , te ni owatsu ta hisha wo mi ken he tatakitsuke te yatsu ta .
miken ga ware te shoushou chi ga shutsu ta . ani ga oyaji ni i tsuke ta . oyaji ga ore wo kandou suru to ii dashi ta .
sono toki ha mou shikata ga nai to kannen shi te senpou no iu touri
kandou sa reru tsumori de i tara , juu nen rai meshitsukatsu te iru ki yo to iu gejo ga ,
naki nagara oyaji ni ayamatsu te , youyaku oyaji no ikari ga toke ta . sore ni mo kakawara zu
amari oyaji wo kowai to ha omowa nakatsu ta . kaette kono kiyoshi to iu gejo ni kinodoku de atsu ta .
kono gejo ha moto yui sho no aru mono datsu ta sou da ga ,
ga kai no toki ni rei raku shi te , tsui houkou made suru you ni natsu ta no da to kii te iru .
da kara baa san de aru . kono baa san ga dou iu i n e n ka ,
ore wo hijou ni kawai gatsu te kure ta . fushigi na mono de aru .
haha mo shinu san nichi mae ni aiso wo tsukashi ta     oyaji mo nenjuu moteamashi te iru
-   machi nai de ha ranbou mono no akutarou to tsumahajiki wo suru
-   kono ore wo muan ni chin choushi te kure ta .
ore ha toutei nin ni suka reru tachi de nai to akirame te i ta kara ,
tanin kara ki no hashi no you ni toriatsukawa reru no ha nani to mo omowa nai ,
kaette kono kiyoshi no you ni chiyahoya shi te kureru no wo fushin ni kangae ta .
kiyoshi ha tokidoki daidokoro de nin no kyo nai toki ni
( anata ha massugu de yoi go kishou da ) to homeru koto ga tokidoki atsu ta .
shikashi ore ni ha kiyoshi no iu imi ga wakara nakatsu ta . ii kishou nara kiyoshi igai no mono mo ,
mou sukoshi yoku shi te kureru darou to omotsu ta . kiyoshi ga konna koto wo iu do ni
ore ha o seji ha kirai da to kotaeru no ga tsune de atsu ta . suru to baa san ha
sore da kara yoi go kishou desu to itsu te ha , ureshi sou ni ore no kao wo nagame te iru .
jibun no chikara de ore wo seizou shi te hokotsu teru you ni mieru . shoushou kimi ga warukatsu ta .
haha ga shin de kara kiyoshi ha iyoiyo ore wo kawai gatsu ta . tokidoki ha
kodomo kokoro ni naze anna ni kawai garu no ka to fushin ni omotsu ta .
tsumara nai , yose ba ii no ni to omotsu ta .
kinodoku da to omotsu ta . sore de mo kiyoshi ha kawai garu . oriori ha jibun no kozukai de
kintsuba ya kou bai yaki wo katsu te kureru . samui yoru nado ha
hisoka ni soba ko wo shiire te oi te , itsu no kan ni kane te iru makuramoto he sobayu wo motsu te rai te kureru . toki
ni ha nabe yaki udon sae katsu te kure ta .
tada kuimono bakari de ha nai . kutsu tabi mo moratsu ta .
enpitsu mo moratsu ta , choumen mo moratsu ta .
kore ha zutto nochi no koto de aru ga kin wo san en bakari kashi te kure ta koto sae aru .
nani mo kase to itsu ta wake de ha nai . mukou de heya he motsu te rai te
o kozukai ga naku te o komari deshou , o tsukai nasai to itsu te kure ta n da .
ore ha muron ira nai to itsu ta ga , zehi tsukae to iu kara , kari te oi ta .
mi ha taihen ureshikatsu ta . sono san en wo gamaguchi he ire te ,
futokoro he ire ta nari benjo he itsu tara ,
supori to kou ka no naka he otoshi te shimatsu ta .
shikata ga nai kara , nosonoso shutsu te ki te
mi ha kore kore da to kiyoshi ni hanashi ta tokoro ga , kiyoshi ha
sassoku take no bou wo sagashi te rai te , totsu te age masu to itsu ta .
shibaraku suru toi do bata de zaazaa oto ga suru kara ,
shutsu te mi tara take no saki he gamaguchi no himo wo hiki kake ta no wo mizu de aratsu te i ta .
sore kara kuchi wo ake te ichien satsu wo aratame tara chairo ni natsu te
moyou ga kie kakatsu te i ta . kiyoshi ha hibachi de kawakashi te , kore de ii deshou to dashi ta .
chotto kai de mi te kusai ya to itsu tara ,
sore ja o dashi nasai , torikae te rai te age masu kara to ,
doko de dou gomakashi ta ka satsu no kawari ni ginka wo san en motsu te rai ta .
kono san en ha nani ni tsukatsu ta ka wasure te shimatsu ta .
ima ni kaesu yo to itsu ta giri , kaesa nai .
ima to natsu te ha juu bai ni shi te kaeshi te yari taku te mo kaese nai .
kiyoshi ga mono wo kureru toki ni ha kanarazu oyaji mo ani mo kyo nai toki ni kagiru .
ore ha nani ga kirai da to itsu te nin ni kakure te
jibun dake e wo suru hodo kirai na koto ha nai .
ani to ha muron naka ga yoku nai keredo mo , ani ni kakushi te
kiyoshi kara kashi ya shoku enpitsu wo morai taku ha nai .
naze , ore hitori ni kure te , ani san ni hayara nai no ka to kiyoshi ni kiku koto ga aru .
suru to kiyoshi ha sumashi ta mono de o anii sama ha o tou sama ga katsu te o age nasaru kara kamai mase n to iu .
kore ha fu kouhei de aru . oyaji ha ganko da keredo mo ,
sonna eko hiiki ha se nu otoko da . shikashi kiyoshi no me kara miru to sou mieru no darou .
mattaku ai ni obore te i ta ni chigai nai .
moto ha mibun no aru mono de mo kyouiku no nai baa san da kara shikata ga nai .
kiyoshi ha ore wo motsu te shourai risshin shusse shi te rippa na mono ni naru to omoikon de i ta .
sono kuse benkyou wo suru ani ha shoku bakari shiroku tte , totemo yaku ni ha tata nai to hitori de kime te shimatsu ta .
konna baa san ni atsu te ha kanawa nai . jibun no suki na mono ha kanarazu erai jinbutsu ni natsu te ,
kirai na hito ha kitto ochi fureru mono to shinji te iru .
ore ha sono toki kara betsudan nani ni naru to iu ryou ken mo nakatsu ta .
shikashi kiyoshi ga naru naru to iu mono da kara ,
yappari nani ka ni nareru n darou to omotsu te i ta .
ima kara kangaeru to bakabakashii . aru toki nado ha
kiyoshi ni donna mono ni naru darou to kii te mi ta koto ga aru .
tokoro ga kiyoshi ni mo betsudan no kangae mo nakatsu ta you da .
tada te guruma he joutsu te , rippa na genkan no aru ie wo koshiraeru ni sou i nai to itsu ta .
sore kara kiyoshi ha ore ga uchi de mo motsu te dokuritsu shi tara ,
issho ni naru ki de i ta . dou ka oi te kudasai to nani hen mo kurikaeshi te tanon da .
ore mo nani da ka uchi ga moteru you na ki ga shi te ,
un oi te yaru to henji dake ha shi te oi ta .
tokoro ga kono onna ha nakanaka souzou no tsuyoi onna de ,
anata ha doko ga o suki , kouji machi desu ka a zabu desu ka ,
o niwa he buranko wo o koshirae asobase ,
seiyou kan ha ichi tsu de takusan desu nado to katte na keikaku wo hitori de narabe te i ta .
sono toki ha ie nanka hosshiku mo nani to mo nakatsu ta .
seiyou kan mo nihon da te mo mattaku fuyou de atsu ta kara ,
sonna mono ha hosshiku nai to , itsu de mo kiyoshi ni kotae ta . suru to ,
anata ha yoku ga sukunaku tte , kokoro ga kirei da to itsu te mata home ta .
kiyoshi ha nani to itsu te mo home te kureru .
haha ga shin de kara go roku nen no kan ha kono joutai de kurashi te i ta .
oyaji ni ha shikara reru . ani to ha kenka wo suru .
kiyoshi ni ha kashi wo morau , tokidoki home rareru .
betsu ni nozomi mo nai . kore de takusan da to omotsu te i ta . hoka no kodomo mo ichigai ni
konna mono darou to omotsu te i ta . tada kiyoshi ga nani ka ni tsuke te ,
anata ha o kawaisou da , fushiawase da to muan ni iu mono da kara ,
sore ja kawaisou de fushiawase na n darou to omotsu ta .
sono soto ni ku ni naru koto ha sukoshi mo nakatsu ta .
tada oyaji ga kozukai wo kure nai ni ha heikou shi ta .
haha ga shin de kara roku nen me no shougatsu ni oyaji mo sotchuu de nakunatsu ta .
sono nen no shi gatsu ni ore ha aru shiritsu no naka gakkou wo sotsugyou suru .
roku gatsu ni ani ha shougyou gakkou wo sotsugyou shi ta . ani ha nani to ka kaisha no
kyuushuu no shiten ni kuchi ga atsu te yuka nakere ba nara n .
ore ha toukyou de mada gakumon wo shi nakere ba nara nai .
ani ha ie wo utsu te zaisan wo katazuke te ninchi he shutsu tatsu suru to ii dashi ta .
ore ha dou de mo suru ga yokarou to henji wo shi ta .
douse ani no yakkai ni naru ki ha nai . sewa wo shi te kureru ni shi ta tokoro de , kenka wo suru kara ,
mukou de mo nani to ka ii dasu ni kimatsu te iru .
namajii hogo wo ukere ba koso , konna ani ni atama wo sage nakere ba nara nai .
gyuunyuu haitatsu wo shi te mo kutsutsu te rareru to kakugo wo shi ta .
ani ha sore kara dougu ya wo yon de rai te ,
senzo daidai no garakuta wo ni sokusa n mon ni utsu ta .
ie yashiki ha aru nin no shuu sen de aru kinman ie ni yuzutsu ta . kono hou ha ooita kin ni natsu ta you da ga ,
kuwashii koto ha ikkou shira nu . ore ha ichi kegatsu izen kara , shibaraku zento no houkou no tsuku made
kanda no ogawa machi he geshuku shi te i ta . kiyoshi ha juu nani nen kyo ta uchi ga
hitode ni wataru no wo ooini zannen gatsu ta ga ,
jibun no mono de nai kara , shiyou ga nakatsu ta .
anata ga mou sukoshi nen wo totsu te irasshare ba ,
koko ga go souzoku ga deki masu mono wo to shikiri ni kudoi te i ta .
mou sukoshi nen wo totsu te souzoku ga dekiru mono nara , ima de mo souzoku ga dekiru hazu da .
baa san ha nanni mo shira nai kara nen sae tore ba ani no ie ga moraeru to shinji te iru .
ani to ore ha kayou ni wakare ta ga , komatsu ta no ha kiyoshi no yukusaki de aru .
ani ha muron tsure te ikeru mibun de nashi , kiyoshi mo ani no shiri ni kutsutsui te
kyuushuu kundari made dekakeru ki ha moutou nashi , to itsu te kono toki no ore ha yo
jou han no an geshuku ni komotsu te , sore sura mo iza to nare ba
tadachini hikiharawa ne ba nara nu shimatsu da . dou suru koto mo deki n . kiyoshi ni kii te mi ta .
doko ka he houkou de mo suru ki ka ne to itsu tara anata ga o uchi wo motsu te , oku sama wo o morai ni naru made ha ,
shikata ga nai kara , oi no yakkai ni nari mashou to youyaku kesshin shi ta henji wo shi ta .
kono oi ha saiban tokoro no shoki de mazu kyou ni ha sashitsukae naku kurashi te i ta kara ,
ima made mo kiyoshi ni kuru nara koi to nisan do susume ta no da ga ,
kiyoshi ha tatoi gejo houkou ha shi te mo nenrai sumi nare ta uchi no hou ga ii to itsu te ouji nakatsu ta . shikashi ima no baai
shira nu yashiki he houkou ga e wo shi te ira nu ki gane wo shi naosu yori , oi no yakkai ni naru hou ga mashi da to omotsu ta no darou .
sore ni shi te mo hayaku uchi wo mote no , sai wo morae no ,
rai te sewa wo suru no to iu . shinmi no oi yori mo
tanin no ore no hou ga suki na no darou . kyuushuu he tatsu ni nichi mae
ani ga geshuku he rai te kin wo roppyaku en dashi te kore wo shihon ni shi te shoubai wo suru nari ,
gakushi ni shi te benkyou wo suru nari , dou de mo zuii ni tsukau ga ii ,
sono kawari ato ha kamawa nai to itsu ta . ani ni shi te ha kanshin na yari hou da ,
nani no roppyaku en gurai morawa n de mo komari ha se n to omotsu ta ga ,
rei ni ji nu ta n baku na shochi ga ki ni itsutsu ta kara , rei wo itsu te moratsu te oi ta .
ani ha sore kara gojuu en dashi te kore wo tsuide ni kiyoshi ni watashi te kure to itsu ta kara , igi naku hikiuke ta .
ni nichi tatsu te shinbashi no tei shaba de wakare ta giri
ani ni ha sono nochi ichi hen mo awa nai .
ore ha roppyaku en no shiyou hou ni tsui te ne nagara kangae ta .
shou bai wo shi tatte mendo kusaku tte umaku dekiru mono ja nashi ,
koto ni roppyaku en no kin de shou bai rashii shou bai ga yareru wake de mo nakarou .
yoshi yareru to shi te mo , ima no you ja nin no mae he shutsu te kyouiku wo uke ta to ibare nai kara tsumari son ni naru bakari da .
shihon nado ha dou de mo ii kara , kore wo gakushi ni shi te benkyou shi te yarou .
roppyaku en wo san ni satsu te ichi nen ni nihyaku en zutsu tsukae ba san nenkan ha benkyou ga dekiru .
san nenkan isshou kenmei ni yare ba nani ka dekiru .
sore kara doko no gakkou he hairou to kangae ta ga ,
gakumon ha shourai dore mo kore mo suki de nai .
koto ni go gaku to ka bungaku to ka iu mono ha mappira gomen da .
shintai shi nado to rai te ha nijuu gyou aru uchi de
ichigyou mo wakara nai . douse kirai na mono nara nani wo yatsu te mo onaji koto da to omotsu ta ga ,
saiwai butsuri gakkou no mae wo tourikakatsu tara seito boshuu no koukoku ga shutsu te i ta kara ,
nani mo heri da to omotsu te kisoku kaki wo moratsu te sugu nyuugaku no tetsuzuki wo shi te shimatsu ta .
ima kangaeru to kore mo oyayuzuri no muteppou kara okotsu ta shissaku da .
san nenkan ma a hito nami ni benkyou ha shi ta ga betsudan tachi no ii hou de mo nai kara ,
sekijun ha itsu de mo shita kara kanjou suru hou ga benri de atsu ta .
shikashi fushigi na mono de , san nen tatsu tara toutou sotsugyou shi te shimatsu ta .
jibun de mo okashii to omotsu ta ga kujou wo iu wake mo nai kara
otonashiku sotsugyou shi te oi ta . sotsugyou shi te kara hachi nichi me ni kouchou ga yobi ni rai ta kara ,
nani ka you darou to omotsu te , dekake te itsu tara , shikoku hen no aru naka gakkou de suugaku no kyoushi ga iru .

go en no chadai wo funpatsu shi te sugu utsuru no ha chito zannen da ga , douse utsuru mono nara , hayaku hiki koshi te ochitsuku hou ga benri da kara , soko no tokoro ha yoroshiku yamaarashi ni tanomu koto ni shi ta .
suru to yamaarashi ha tomokaku mo issho ni rai te miro to iu kara , itsu ta .
machihazure no oka no chuufuku ni aru ie de shigoku kansei da .
shujin ha kottou wo baibai suru ika gin to iu otoko de , nyoubou ha tei shu yori mo shi tsu bakari to shi kasa no onna da .
naka gakkou ni kyo ta toki uitchi to iu kotoba wo naratsu ta koto ga aru ga kono nyoubou ha

toutou ashita kara hikiutsuru koto ni shi ta .
kaeri ni yamaarashi ha toori chou de kourimizu wo ichipai ogotsu ta .
gakkou de atsu ta toki ha ya ni oufuu na shikkei na yatsu da to omotsu ta ga , konna ni iroiro sewa wo shi te kureru tokoro wo miru to , warui otoko de mo nasa sou da .
tada ore to onaji you ni sekkachi de kanshaku mochi rashii . ato de kii tara
kono otoko ga ichiban seito ni jinbou ga aru no da sou da . shou
mashi ta . san iyoiyo gakkou he shutsu ta . hajimete kyoujou he haitsu te takai tokoro he joutsu ta toki ha ,
nani da ka hen datsu ta . koushaku wo shi nagara , ore de mo sensei ga tsutomaru no ka to omotsu ta .
seito ha yakamashii . tokidoki zunuke ta ookina koe de sensei to iu .
sensei ni ha kotae ta . ima made butsuri gakkou de
mainichi sensei sensei to yobitsuke te i ta ga ,
sensei to yobu no to , yoba reru no ha un de i no sa da .
nani da ka ashi no ura ga muzumuzu suru .
ore ha hikyou na ningen de ha nai . okubyou na otoko de mo nai ga ,

ore ha edo tsuko de kyasha ni ozakuri ni deki te iru kara ,

kenka nara sumou tori to de mo yatsu te miseru ga ,

kabe ha susu de makkuro da . tenjou ha ranpu no yuen de

oi tenpura wo motsu te koi to ookina koe wo dashi ta .

iya ni hinetsu kobi ta , ue kibachi no kae de mi ta you na shou jin ga dekiru n da .

ya na yatsu da . wazawaza toukyou kara ,

naru to gakkou yori kottou no hou ga mada mashi da .

kondo ha seito ni mo awa nakatsu ta kara , dare mo shiru mai to omotsu te ,

jissai ore ha ni sara kutsutsu te shichi sen haratsu ta . dou mo yakkai na yatsu nado da .
ni jikan me ni mo kitto nani ka aru to omou to yuukaku no dango umai umai to kai te aru . akirekaetsu ta yatsu nado da .

nani no koto da to omotsu tara , tsumara nai raireki da .
ore ha koko he rai te kara , mainichi sumita no onsen he iku koto ni kime te iru .
hoka no tokoro ha nani wo ken te mo toukyou no ashimoto ni mo oyoba nai ga onsen dake ha rippa na mono da .
sekkaku rai ta mono da kara mainichi ha itsu te yarou to iu ki de , banmeshi mae ni undou katagata de kakeru . tokoro ga iku toki ha kanarazu seiyou tenugui no ookina yatsu wo burasage te iku .
kono tenugui ga yu ni somatsu ta ue he , akai shima ga nagaredashi ta no de chotto miru to be ni iro ni mieru .
ore ha kono tenugui wo iki mo kaeri mo , kisha ni joutsu te mo arui te mo , tsune ni burasage te iru .
sore de seito ga ore no koto wo aka tenugui aka tenugui to iu n da sou da .
dou mo semai tochi ni sun deru to urusai mono da .
mada aru . onsen ha san kai no shinchiku de
joutou ha yukata wo kashi te , nagashi wo tsuke te hachi sen de sumu .
sono ue ni onna ga ten moku he cha wo nose te dasu . ore ha itsu de mo joutou he haitsu ta .
suru to shijuu en no gekkyuu de mainichi ue nado he hairu no ha zeitaku da to ii dashi ta .
yokei na o sewa da . mada aru . yu tsubo ha mikage ishi wo tatami age te , juu go jou jiki gurai no kou sa ni shikitsu te aru .
taitei ha juu san shi nin tsukatsu teru ga tamani ha dare mo kyo nai koto ga aru .
shin sa ha tatsu te chichi no hen made aru kara ,
undou no tame ni , yu no naka wo oyogu no ha nakanaka yukai da .
ore ha nin no kyo nai no wo misumashi te ha juu go tatami no yutsubo wo oyogimawatsu te yorokon de i ta .
tokoro ga aru nichi san kai kara isei yoku kudari te
kyou mo oyogeru ka na to zakuro kuchi wo nozoi te miru to ,

no naka de oyogu mono ha , amari aru mai kara , kono hari fuda ha ore no tame ni
tokubetsu ni shinchou shi ta no ka mo shire nai . ore ha sore kara oyogu no ha dannen shi ta .
oyogu no ha dannen shi ta ga , gakkou he shutsu te miru to , rei no touri kokuban ni yu
no naka de oyogu bekara zu to kai te aru ni ha odoroi ta .
nani da ka seito zentai ga ore hitori wo tantei shi te iru you ni omowa re ta . kusakusa shi ta .
seito ga nani wo itsu tatte , yarou to omotsu ta koto wo yameru you na ore de ha nai ga ,
nani de konna semakurushii hana no saki ga tsukaeru you na tokoro he rai ta no ka to omou to nasakenaku natsu ta .
sore de uchi he kaeru to sou kawara zu kottou seki de aru . shou
tadashi tanuki to aka shatsu ha reigai de aru .
nani de kono ryounin ga touzen no gimu wo manukareru no ka to kii te mi tara ,
sou nin tai guu da kara to iu . omoshiroku mo nai .
gekkyuu ha takusan toru , jikan ha sukunai , sore de shukuchoku wo nogareru nante
fu kouhei ga aru mono ka . katte na kisoku wo koshirae te ,
sore ga atarimae da to iu you na kao wo shi te iru .
yoku maa anna ni zuuzuushiku dekiru mono da . kore ni tsui te ha ooita fuhei de aru ga ,
yamaarashi no setsu ni yoru to , ikura hitori de fuhei wo narabe tatte
touru mono ja nai sou da . hitori da tte futari da tte
tadashii koto nara touri sou na mono da . yamaarashi ha might is right
to iu eigo wo hii te se tsuyu wo kuwae ta ga , nani da ka youryou wo e nai kara ,
kikikaeshi te mi tara tsuwamono no kenri to iu imi da sou da .
tsuwamono no kenri gurai nara mukashi kara shitsu te iru .
imasara yamaarashi kara koushaku wo kika nakutsu te mo ii .
tsuwamono no kenri to shukuchoku to ha betsu mondai da .
tanuki ya aka shatsu ga tsuwamono da nante , dare ga shouchi suru mono ka .
giron ha giron to shi te kono shukuchoku ga iyoiyo ore no ban ni mawatsu te rai ta .
ittai kanshou da kara ya gu futon nado ha
jibun no mono he raku ni ne nai to ne ta you na kokoromochi ga shi nai .
kodomo no toki kara , tomodachi no uchi he tomatsu ta koto ha hotondo nai kurai da .
tomodachi no uchi de sae iya nara gakkou no shukuchoku ha naosara en da .
en da keredo mo , kore ga shijuu en no uchi he komotsu te iru nara shikata ga nai .
gaman shi te tsutome te yarou . kyoushi mo seito mo kaetsu te shimatsu ta ato de ,
hitori pokan to shi te iru no ha zuibun kan ga nuke ta mono da .
shukuchoku heya ha kyoujou no urate ni aru kishuku sha no nishi hazure no isshitsu da .
chotto haitsu te mi ta ga , nishibi wo matomo ni uke te ,
kurushiku tte itatamare nai . inaka dake atsu te aki ga ki te mo ,
kinaga ni atsui mon da . seito no makanai wo toriyose te
banmeshi wo sumashi ta ga , mazui ni ha osoreitsu ta .
yoku anna mono wo kutsutsu te , are dake ni abare rare ta mon da .

aka shatsu ha koe ga ki ni kuwa nai .
are ha mochimae no koe wo wazato kidotsu te
anna yasashii you ni mise teru n darou .
ikura kidotsu tatte , ano men ja dame da .
horeru mono ga atsu ta tte madonna gurai na mono da .
shikashi kyoutou dake ni no da yori muzukashii koto wo iu .
uchi he kaetsu te , aitsu no moushijou wo kangae te miru to ichiou mottomo no you de mo aru .
hakkiri to shi ta koto ha unwa nai kara , kentou ga tsuki kaneru ga ,
nani de mo yamaarashi ga yoku nai yatsu da kara youjin shiro to iu no rashii .
sore nara sou to hakkiri dangen suru ga ii , otoko rashiku mo nai .
sou shi te , sonna warui kyoushi nara , hayaku men shoku sashi tara yokarou .
kyoutou nante bungaku samurai no kuse ni iku ji no nai mon da .
kageguchi wo kiku no de sae , kouzen to namae ga ie nai kurai na otoko da kara , yowamushi ni kimatsu teru .
yowamushi ha shinsetsu na mono da kara , ano aka shatsu mo onna no you na shinsetsu mono na n darou .
shinsetsu ha shinsetsu , koe ha koe da kara , koe ga ki ni ira nai tte , shinsetsu wo mu ni shi cha suji ga chigau .
sore ni shi te mo yononaka ha fushigi na mono da , mushi no suka nai yatsu ga shinsetsu de , ki no atsu ta tomodachi ga warumono da nante ,
nin wo baka ni shi te iru . ookata inaka da kara banji toukyou nosaka ni iku n darou .
bussou na tokoro da . ima ni kaji ga kooritsu te , ishi ga toufu ni naru ka mo shire nai .

ichiban jinbou no aru kyoushi da to iu kara ,

mono ha soudan zuku de dou de mo naru .

sukoshi mata nakutsu cha shutsu mase n , kutabire masu kara o kake nasai to mata susume te mi ta .
mi ha dou ka shi te , soba he kake te morai takatsu ta kurai ni

ore ga kyo nakutsu cha nippon ga komaru darou to iu you na men wo

irootoko no tonya wo motsu te mizukara ninji te iru no mo aru .
kyouiku ga iki te furokku kooto wo kire ba ore ni naru n da to unwa nu bakari no tanuki mo iru .
minami na sore souou ni ibatsu teru n da ga ,

otonashiku shi te iru no ha ken ta koto ga nai . kao ha fukure te iru ga ,
konna kekkou na otoko wo sute te aka shatsu ni nabiku nante ,
madonna mo yo tsu bo do ki no shire nai o kyan da .
aka shatsu ga nani daasu yotsu tatte , kore hodo rippa na danna sama ga dekiru mon ka .

tokoro he iriguchi de wakawakashii onna no shousei ga kikoe ta kara ,
